antimage_mana_break.desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.
antimage_mana_break.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

antimage_persectur.desc: Attacks slow enemies based on how much mana they are missing. Min slow at 50% mana, up to max slow at 0% mana. No effect if enemy is above 50% mana.

antimage_blink.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
antimage_blink.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

antimage_counterspell.desc: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and reflects any targeted spells.
antimage_counterspell.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

antimage_counterspell_ally.desc: Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and reflects any targeted spells. Any time a spell is blocked by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
antimage_counterspell_ally.lore: The only magic that Anti-Mage will even barely tolerate... is friendship.

antimage_mana_void.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.
antimage_mana_void.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

axe_berserkers_call.desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
axe_berserkers_call.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

axe_battle_hunger.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
axe_battle_hunger.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.

axe_counter_helix.desc: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
axe_counter_helix.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

axe_culling_blade.desc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
axe_culling_blade.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

axe_one_man_army.desc: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.

axe_coat_of_blood.desc: Axe permanently drenches his blade every time he kills an enemy Hero, gaining 0.2 bonus armor for each stack. Killing with Culling Blade gives 3x stacks.

bane_enfeeble.desc: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
bane_enfeeble.lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

bane_brain_sap.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
bane_brain_sap.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

bane_fiends_grip.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
bane_fiends_grip.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

bane_nightmare.desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage Nightmared targets freely.
bane_nightmare.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

bane_ichor_of_nyctasha.desc: Bane's attribute gains are always evenly distributed across all three attributes (items that grant +3 Strength will now grant +1 Str/Agi/Int).

bloodseeker_bloodrage.desc: Drives Bloodseeker or an allied hero into a bloodthirsty rage which causes them to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of their health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
bloodseeker_bloodrage.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

bloodseeker_blood_bath.desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
bloodseeker_blood_bath.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

bloodseeker_thirst.desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 100%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
bloodseeker_thirst.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

bloodseeker_rupture.desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
bloodseeker_rupture.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

bloodseeker_blood_mist.desc:
Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Sanguivore's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. 

Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.

bloodseeker_sanguivore.desc:
Bloodseeker restores some life when he kills a unit, equal to 1.5% of the units max health per Bloodseeker's Level plus a base of 25.

Restores for half values if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero.

crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement in the targeted area.
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

crystal_maiden_frostbite.desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Deals 4x damage to non-ancient creeps.
crystal_maiden_frostbite.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 3x the mana regeneration.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

crystal_maiden_freezing_field.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

crystal_maiden_crystal_clone.desc: Slides in a direction, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
crystal_maiden_crystal_clone.lore: So convincing that some allies have spent minutes talking to the clone before they realized she wasn't speaking back.

crystal_maiden_blueheart_floe.desc: Crystal Maiden has 25% Mana Regeneration Amplification.

drow_ranger_frost_arrows.desc: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

drow_ranger_multishot.desc: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
drow_ranger_multishot.lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow.
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

drow_ranger_trueshot.desc: Grants Drow bonus agility based on Drow's current agility and level. Nearby ranged heroes received 50% of the bonus agility.
drow_ranger_trueshot.lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

drow_ranger_marksmanship.desc: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.
drow_ranger_marksmanship.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.

drow_ranger_glacier.desc: Drow creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast.
drow_ranger_glacier.lore: Traxex wasn't just adopted by the Drow, she was adopted by the lands they lived in.

drow_ranger_vantage_point.desc: Drow deals 30% more damage when attacking from high ground.

earthshaker_fissure.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
earthshaker_fissure.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

earthshaker_enchant_totem.desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100 bonus attack range on the next attack.
earthshaker_enchant_totem.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

earthshaker_aftershock.desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
earthshaker_aftershock.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.

earthshaker_echo_slam.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
earthshaker_echo_slam.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

earthshaker_spirit_cairn.desc: When Earthshaker dies, a 75 radius fissure is created where he died. This fissure blocks movement and allows Earthshaker to continue to gain experience around it. It remains until Earthshaker respawns.

earthshaker_slugger.desc: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem or Earthshaker's other abilities are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.

juggernaut_blade_dance.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
juggernaut_blade_dance.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

juggernaut_blade_fury.desc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage every 0.2s to nearby enemy units. Applies a strong dispel at the end of the spin.
juggernaut_blade_fury.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

juggernaut_healing_ward.desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.
juggernaut_healing_ward.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.

juggernaut_omni_slash.desc:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
juggernaut_omni_slash.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'

juggernaut_swift_slash.desc: Performs a short Omnislash for 1 seconds.
juggernaut_swift_slash.lore: A briefer onslaught for those less deserving of the honor.

juggernaut_duelist.desc: Juggernaut deals 12% more damage to targets that are facing him. Damage bonus always applies during Omnislash.

juggernaut_bladeform.desc: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.

mirana_arrow.desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 2.6 seconds, with bonus damage up to 150 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
mirana_arrow.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

mirana_invis.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. Mirana gains bonus outgoing damage during the duration. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
mirana_invis.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.

mirana_solar_flare.desc:
Gradually increases attack speed and damage of Mirana and all allied heroes, reaching maximum power after 6s. 

 Allies receive 50% of the bonus.

mirana_leap.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 5 seconds.
mirana_leap.lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

mirana_starfall.desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 675 radius will be struck a second time.
mirana_starfall.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.

mirana_selemenes_faithful.desc: Healing Lotuses are 50% more effective on Mirana and her allies.

nevermore_shadowraze1.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.

nevermore_shadowraze2.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.

nevermore_shadowraze3.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.

nevermore_necromastery.desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. Hero kills grant 3 souls. On death, he releases 30% of them from bondage.
nevermore_necromastery.lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.

nevermore_dark_lord.desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
nevermore_dark_lord.lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.

nevermore_frenzy.desc: Shadow Fiend gains Bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for 8 seconds. For the duration of the effect, Necromastery's Max Soul count is increased by 5, but he loses that amount of souls after it is done.
nevermore_frenzy.lore: For Nevermore, there's as much delight in the harvest as there is in the feast.

nevermore_requiem.desc:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.6 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.15. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. 

 Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
nevermore_requiem.lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.

morphling_waveform.desc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
morphling_waveform.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.

The target is also knocked back based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum knockback distance is used.
morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

morphling_morph_agi.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
morphling_morph_agi.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

morphling_morph_str.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
morphling_morph_str.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

morphling_ebb.desc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Agility.

morphling_flow.desc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Strength. Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's strength. Morphling gains 1% Spell Amp per 4 Agility.

morphling_replicate.desc: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
morphling_replicate.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.

morphling_morph_replicate.desc: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

morphling_accumulation.desc: Morphling receives 50% of stat growth bonuses every half level instead of the full bonus at level up. All Attributes bonuses from skill points in the Talent Tree provide an additional +3 to Morphling's primary attribute.

phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.

phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.desc:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.

phantom_lancer_juxtapose.desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...

phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.desc: When targeting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.

phantom_lancer_illusory_armaments.desc: Items, abilities, and auras that grant bonus damage instead grant base damage.

puck_illusory_orb.desc: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
puck_illusory_orb.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.

puck_ethereal_jaunt.desc: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
puck_ethereal_jaunt.lore: The Orb is an egg of potential, traveling along its own timeline.

puck_puckish.desc: Whenever Puck disjoints an attack, it restores 10 + 2% of its max mana and 10 + 2% of its max health. Dodging a targeted spell projectile restores 3.5x that amount.

puck_waning_rift.desc: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
puck_waning_rift.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

puck_phase_shift.desc: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
puck_phase_shift.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.

puck_dream_coil.desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
puck_dream_coil.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.

pudge_flesh_heap.desc: Pudge covers himself with a layer of flesh that blocks damage of any type taken from any source.
pudge_flesh_heap.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

pudge_meat_hook.desc: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
pudge_meat_hook.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.

pudge_rot.desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
pudge_rot.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.

pudge_eject.desc: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.

pudge_dismember.desc: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75 units, up to a minimum of 125 range.
pudge_dismember.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'

pudge_innate_graft_flesh.desc: Pudge's skin thickens permanently every time he kills an enemy Hero, gaining 1.1 bonus Strength for each stack.

razor_plasma_field.desc: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
razor_plasma_field.lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

razor_static_link.desc: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
razor_static_link.lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.

razor_storm_surge.desc: There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
razor_storm_surge.lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

razor_eye_of_the_storm.desc: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at the enemy unit with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing armor.

sandking_burrowstrike.desc:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit

 Can be put on alt-cast to immediately cast in the desired direction, without walking towards the targeted location.
sandking_burrowstrike.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

sandking_sand_storm.desc: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units and grants Sand King Invisibility while he is in it. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
sandking_sand_storm.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.

sandking_caustic_finale.desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when they die.
sandking_caustic_finale.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

sandking_epicenter.desc: After a cast point of 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
sandking_epicenter.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.

sandking_scorpion_strike.desc: Sand King strikes an area, performing an attack on all enemies in the area of effect, dealing extra damage to each. Enemies within an innermost radius of 125 take 40% extra damage. Applies Caustic Finale and a slow to all enemies hit.
sandking_scorpion_strike.lore: Crixalis is certainly capable of mercy, but the soul of the sand finds few foes worth sparing.

storm_spirit_electric_rave.desc: Grants Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

storm_spirit_static_remnant.desc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
storm_spirit_static_remnant.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.

storm_spirit_electric_vortex.desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.

storm_spirit_overload.desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

storm_spirit_ball_lightning.desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.65% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

storm_spirit_galvanized.desc: Storm Spirit gains a charge of 0.2 mana regeneration per kill. Loses 3 charges per death. Leveling Ball Lightning gives Storm Spirit 3 bonus charges. Additionally every time he gains a charge he also gains 0.1 Mana Regen permanently.

sven_storm_bolt.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
sven_storm_bolt.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

sven_great_cleave.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
sven_great_cleave.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

sven_warcry.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 8 seconds.
sven_warcry.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

sven_gods_strength.desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 35 seconds.
sven_gods_strength.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.

sven_vanquisher.desc: Sven's attacks deal 20% bonus damage to stunned enemies.

sven_wrath_of_god.desc: Sven gains additional attack damage from Strength.

tiny_avalanche.desc: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units.
tiny_avalanche.lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

tiny_toss.desc: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
tiny_toss.lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.

tiny_craggy_exterior.desc: Enemies that attack Tiny receive a stacking debuff that lowers their attack damage with each stack.

tiny_tree_grab.desc: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

tiny_toss_tree.desc: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
tiny_toss_tree.lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

tiny_tree_channel.desc: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
tiny_tree_channel.lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

tiny_grow.desc: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, movement speed and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
tiny_grow.lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

tiny_insurmountable.desc: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength. Slow Resistance also reduces the impact of Attack Speed slows.

vengefulspirit_magic_missile.desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
vengefulspirit_magic_missile.lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

vengefulspirit_command_aura.desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
vengefulspirit_command_aura.lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.

vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

vengefulspirit_nether_swap.desc: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.

vengefulspirit_soul_strike.desc: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.

vengefulspirit_retribution.desc: Whenever an enemy hero kills Vengeful Spirit, they get a debuff until their next death, causing Vengeful Spirit to deal 20% bonus damage to them.

windrunner_gale_force.desc: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
windrunner_gale_force.lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

windrunner_shackleshot.desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.
windrunner_shackleshot.lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.

windrunner_powershot.desc: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages and slows enemies' movement speed along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow is reduced.
windrunner_powershot.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.

windrunner_windrun.desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.
windrunner_windrun.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

windrunner_focusfire.desc: Windranger channels the wind to gain 0 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
windrunner_focusfire.lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.

windrunner_easy_breezy.desc: Windranger's movement speed cannot be lower than 240 and can reach 600.

zuus_heavenly_jump.desc: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
zuus_heavenly_jump.lore: Though temporarily barred from the heavens, Zeus can still manage a measure of godly flight.

zuus_arc_lightning.desc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal damage.
zuus_arc_lightning.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

zuus_lightning_bolt.desc: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 500 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
zuus_lightning_bolt.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

zuus_cloud.desc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

zuus_static_field.desc: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to a percentage of their current health.
zuus_static_field.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

zuus_thundergods_wrath.desc:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, dealing damage, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
zuus_thundergods_wrath.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

zuus_lightning_hands.desc: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.
zuus_lightning_hands.lore: A helping hand from Aghanim lets the fallen Lord of Heaven tap into some of his old strengths.

kunkka_tidal_wave.desc: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
kunkka_tidal_wave.lore: A good sailor knows the timing of the tides like the back of his hand.

kunkka_torrent.desc: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
kunkka_torrent.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.

kunkka_tidebringer.desc: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
kunkka_tidebringer.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.desc: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds. Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.

kunkka_return.desc: Returns the marked hero to the X.

kunkka_ghostship.desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a strong swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
kunkka_ghostship.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.

lina_dragon_slave.desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
lina_dragon_slave.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.

lina_light_strike_array.desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
lina_light_strike_array.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.

lina_fiery_soul.desc: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.
lina_fiery_soul.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.

lina_flame_cloak.desc: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
lina_flame_cloak.lore: A natural defense equally suited to keeping anything from unwanted sisters to snarling hellbeasts at bay.

lina_laguna_blade.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
lina_laguna_blade.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.

lina_slow_burn.desc: Lina's spells deal 125% total damage. 60% is dealt on impact and 65% is dealt as burn damage over 3s.

lina_combustion.desc: Every 175 damage Lina does to an enemy hero causes them to overheat, doing damage to their nearby allies. This effect can trigger multiple times off a single instance of damage. Overheated illusions do less damage.

lich_frost_nova.desc: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds. The primary target receives both base and area damage.
lich_frost_nova.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

lich_death_charge.desc: Lich cannot gain passive mana regeneration, but any unit dying within 1500 range of Lich restores 2.5% of his Max Mana (Dying heroes restore 15% of Lich's Max Mana). Instant mana restoration from items and abilities apply to Lich as normal.

lich_sinister_gaze.desc: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.

lich_frost_shield.desc: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
lich_frost_shield.lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.

lich_chain_frost.desc: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces. Chain Frost lingers on its last target if it fails to bounce and can bounce again if new targets become available.
lich_chain_frost.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.

lich_ice_spire.desc:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 4 hero hits or 8 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can be cast on the Spire and can bounce to the Spire and damage the spire by 1 hero attack if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.
lich_ice_spire.lore: The waters within the Black Pool remain liquid far below the point of freezing and immediately crystallize when removed.

lion_impale.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
lion_impale.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.

lion_voodoo.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
lion_voodoo.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.

lion_mana_drain.desc:
CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time. If the enemy has no mana remaining, the slow is increased by 15%. 

 Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a 50% rate.
lion_mana_drain.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.

lion_finger_of_death.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
lion_finger_of_death.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.

lion_to_hell_and_back.desc: Lion gains 20% debuff duration and 20% spell amplification for 90s after respawning.

shadow_shaman_ether_shock.desc: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.

shadow_shaman_voodoo.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
shadow_shaman_voodoo.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.

shadow_shaman_shackles.desc: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
shadow_shaman_shackles.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.desc: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. Creeps deal half damage to the Serpent Ward.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.

shadow_shaman_fowl_play.desc:
When taking lethal damage, Shadow Shaman receives a strong dispel and survives as a 1 HP chicken. Incoming damage is reduced to zero for 1s.Cooldown is reset upon respawning.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
shadow_shaman_fowl_play.lore: Rhasta had to learn early on how to stay one step ahead of those who (rightfully or wrongfully) wished him harm.

shadow_shaman_voodoo_hands.desc: Your next attack on an enemy hero transforms them into a chicken for 1s.
shadow_shaman_voodoo_hands.lore: Even a brief moment as a chicken is long enough to make most would-be aggressors rethink their mark.

slardar_seaborn_sentinel.desc: Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration, attack damage, and armor while in a puddle, trail, or river.

slardar_sprint.desc: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units.
slardar_sprint.lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.

slardar_slithereen_crush.desc: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
slardar_slithereen_crush.lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.

slardar_bash.desc: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target.
slardar_bash.lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.

slardar_amplify_damage.desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it.
slardar_amplify_damage.lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

tidehunter_gush.desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
tidehunter_gush.lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

tidehunter_kraken_shell.desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. Reduced block amount versus creeps.

Can be activated to double the block amount at the cost of 40% movement speed. Lasts 4s.
tidehunter_kraken_shell.lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.

tidehunter_anchor_smash.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
tidehunter_anchor_smash.lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.

tidehunter_ravage.desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
tidehunter_ravage.lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.

tidehunter_dead_in_the_water.desc: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.

tidehunter_blubber.desc:
Tidehunter's hide removes negative status effects if he takes more than 450 damage. Removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Damage increases each bounce.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.

witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

witch_doctor_maledict.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
witch_doctor_maledict.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.

witch_doctor_death_ward.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.
witch_doctor_death_ward.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo.desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

witch_doctor_gris_gris.desc:
Witch Doctor gets a Gris-Gris, an item that cannot be dropped or placed in the backpack. When the owner dies, 100% of the gold lost from death is added to the item, and will be refunded when the item is consumed. The value of the Gris-Gris is increased by 1 every 3s. 

 Right-click to consume and permanently remove the item.

riki_smoke_screen.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies and causing them to miss attacks.
riki_smoke_screen.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.

riki_blink_strike.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
riki_blink_strike.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.

riki_backstab.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

riki_innate_backstab.desc: Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility.

riki_tricks_of_the_trade.desc: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him. While phased out his attack damage is reduced, but his Agility greatly increases.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.

enigma_malefice.desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
enigma_malefice.lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

enigma_demonic_conversion.desc: Summons three fragments of Enigma himself at the cost of health. The eidolons health is increased by 3% of Enigma's current health. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply. When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
enigma_demonic_conversion.lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

enigma_midnight_pulse.desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing 5 + a percentage of the enemies current HP as damage.
enigma_midnight_pulse.lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.

enigma_black_hole.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
enigma_black_hole.lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

enigma_gravity_well.desc: Allies within 500 distance from Enigma have up to 9% Damage Reduction. Effect starts at 0% at max distance and increases to its maximum strength when the ally is at 200 distance. Does not affect Enigma itself.

enigma_splitting_image.desc: Enigma spawns Eidolons upon receiving damage.

enigma_event_horizon.desc: Units in a 600 radius moving away from Enigma have a 8% movespeed penalty.

tinker_defense_matrix.desc: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.
tinker_defense_matrix.lore: A gifted mind unconstrained by moral or ethical boundaries tends to attract an adversary or two.

tinker_keen_teleport.desc: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
tinker_keen_teleport.lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

tinker_eureka.desc: Tinker gains 1% item cooldown reduction per 3 Intelligence, up to a maximum of 60%.

tinker_laser.desc: Fires an intense energy beam, damaging and blinding the target. Blinded targets miss all physical attacks.
tinker_laser.lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

tinker_march_of_the_machines.desc: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
tinker_march_of_the_machines.lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.

tinker_rearm.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on Tinker's abilities.
tinker_rearm.lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.

tinker_warp_grenade.desc:
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 2 seconds.

 The teleport location is always the ability's current cast range + 100 from Tinker's position when he threw the flare.
tinker_warp_grenade.lore: Tinker's deadliest weapon instantly turns an enemy into space dust. Research to resolve the annoying 'perfect copy' side effect... is ongoing.

sniper_concussive_grenade.desc: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.
sniper_concussive_grenade.lore: ATTN: IN CASE OF DANGER PULL PIN

sniper_shrapnel.desc: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35 seconds.
sniper_shrapnel.lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.

sniper_headshot.desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Knockback distance increases based on how close the enemy is to Sniper. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100%.
sniper_headshot.lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.

sniper_take_aim.desc: Increases vision range, Headshot chance, and attack range. Slows you by 65% for the duration and restricts your vision to a frontal cone.
sniper_take_aim.lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

sniper_assassinate.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals Sniper's attack damage plus bonus damage at long range and mini-stuns the target. Whenever Sniper kills an enemy hero, Assassinate is refreshed.
sniper_assassinate.lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.

necrolyte_death_seeker.desc: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.
necrolyte_death_seeker.lore: The Rumusque Faithful consider Necrophos to be more plague than person.

necrolyte_death_pulse.desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
necrolyte_death_pulse.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.

necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.

necrolyte_sadist.desc: Necrophos gains stacking regen for 8 seconds for each unit he kills. Hero kills multiply the effect.

necrolyte_ghost_shroud.desc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
necrolyte_ghost_shroud.lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.

necrolyte_reapers_scythe.desc: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.

warlock_fatal_bonds.desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
warlock_fatal_bonds.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.

warlock_shadow_word.desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, casting a spell on a unit that makes it deal damage to nearby enemy units and heal nearby ally units. Target Unit will also heal or be damaged depending on whether they are ally or enemy.
warlock_shadow_word.lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

warlock_upheaval.desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to 10 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 1 second after leaving the area or the spell ends.
warlock_upheaval.lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.

warlock_rain_of_chaos.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has increased Slow Resistance, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
warlock_rain_of_chaos.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

warlock_golem_flaming_fists.desc: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.

warlock_golem_permanent_immolation.desc: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, dealing damage per second.

warlock_imp_explode.desc: Shortly after dying, a burst of magic damage is dealt to all enemies in a small area. Does 50% less damage to non-hero targets.

warlock_eldritch_summoning.desc: Whenever an enemy unit dies while afflicted by one or more of Warlock's abilities, a minor imp is summoned that lasts for 15 seconds and explodes on death. Imps will automatically seek out nearby units, favoring fatally bonded heroes, and will explode when reaching their prey.

beastmaster_wild_axes.desc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
beastmaster_wild_axes.lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.desc: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

beastmaster_hawk_dive.desc: Flies towards the target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it.

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.desc: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every 4s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

beastmaster_boar_poison.desc: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.

beastmaster_greater_boar_poison.desc: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.

beastmaster_inner_beast.desc: Untaps the inner fury of Beastmaster and units he controls, passively increasing their attack speed.
beastmaster_inner_beast.lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

beastmaster_primal_roar.desc: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.
beastmaster_primal_roar.lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

beastmaster_drums_of_slom.desc:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.5s between hits after 20 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10 attacks.
beastmaster_drums_of_slom.lore: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.

beastmaster_rugged.desc: Beastmaster's melee hero Damage Block Chance is increased from 50% to 100% versus non-hero units.

queenofpain_shadow_strike.desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 16 seconds. An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
queenofpain_shadow_strike.lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.

queenofpain_blink.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
queenofpain_blink.lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.

queenofpain_scream_of_pain.desc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.

queenofpain_sonic_wave.desc: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
queenofpain_sonic_wave.lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.

queenofpain_masochist.desc: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.

queenofpain_succubus.desc: All sources of Spell Lifesteal also apply to Pure Damage. Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies. Lifesteal is at its maximum when the enemy is 300 units or closer to her and at its minimum when the enemy is 800 units or further from her.

queenofpain_bondage.desc: Whenever an enemy within 1200 range deals spell damage to Queen of Pain, she returns 20% of the damage dealt.

venomancer_venomous_gale.desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
venomancer_venomous_gale.lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.

venomancer_poison_sting.desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
venomancer_poison_sting.lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.

venomancer_plague_ward.desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
venomancer_plague_ward.lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

venomancer_noxious_plague.desc: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.
venomancer_noxious_plague.lore: Deep in the heart of the jungles of Jidi, the seeds of extermination freely grow.

venomancer_sepsis.desc: Venomancer's attacks deal extra damage based on how many debuffs the attack target has. Extra damage is dealt as magical damage. Only counts debuffs from Venomancer or his Plague Wards.

faceless_void_time_walk.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
faceless_void_time_walk.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

faceless_void_distortion_field.desc: Enemy Attack Projectiles within 600 radius are slowed by 35%.

faceless_void_time_walk_reverse.desc: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

faceless_void_time_lock.desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
faceless_void_time_lock.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.

faceless_void_time_dilation.desc: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 7% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown.

faceless_void_chronosphere.desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
faceless_void_chronosphere.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.

faceless_void_time_zone.desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, altering the movement, cast, projectile, cooldown, and turn rate speed of all units inside. Allies have increased speed and cooldown acceleration. Enemies have decreased speed, and have frozen ability and item cooldowns. Time Dilation does not tick down while inside.
faceless_void_time_zone.lore: For the Acolytes of Clasz, stopping time is trivial, but manipulating the minutiae of its flow requires a mastery few have attained.

skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

skeleton_king_bone_guard.desc: Gains a Charge for every 2 creeps killed and 2 charges per hero killed. Activate to spend all charges, summoning skeletons that respawn once when killed. Skeletons benefit from Vampiric Spirit's lifesteal.
skeleton_king_bone_guard.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

skeleton_king_spectral_blade.desc: Curses units that Wraith King attacks, dealing a flat amount of damage and a percentage of the attack damage again after a delay. Vampiric Spirit's lifesteal applies to the curse damage and a unit cannot be cursed again for a short period of time.
skeleton_king_spectral_blade.lore: The eternal spite of every soul stolen by Ostarion bleeds into reality with each strike of his murderous blade.

skeleton_king_mortal_strike.desc: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
skeleton_king_mortal_strike.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

skeleton_king_reincarnation.desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius are slowed. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.

skeleton_king_vampiric_spirit.desc: Grants Wraith King Lifesteal. When slain Wraith King turns into a free pathing Wraith with Bonus Attack and Movement Speed for a short duration, delaying his death. Wraith King cannot reincarnate after being a Wraith.

death_prophet_carrion_swarm.desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.

death_prophet_silence.desc: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
death_prophet_silence.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.

death_prophet_spirit_siphon.desc: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

death_prophet_exorcism.desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 40 seconds.Increases Death Prophet's movement speed while active.
death_prophet_exorcism.lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.

death_prophet_spirit_collector.desc: Hero deaths empower your next Exorcism.

phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives.desc: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.
phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives.lore: A sister is generally given a single name, but powerful names often have plentiful allies.

phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.desc: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+30% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.

phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.

phantom_assassin_immaterial.desc:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Evasion improves with Phantom Assassin's levels. 

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

phantom_assassin_blur.desc: Phantom Assassin blurs her body, disjointing incoming projectiles, increasing her movement speed, causing her to be impossible to see until she comes near enemy heroes or towers.
phantom_assassin_blur.lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.

phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, acquiring a chance of gaining Deadly Focus with each attack. When attacking with Deadly Focus, Phantom Assassin will consume the buff and guarantee a critical hit. Stifling Dagger has a bonus chance to cause Deadly Focus.
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.

pugna_nether_blast.desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area. Deals 65% damage to structures.
pugna_nether_blast.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.

pugna_decrepify.desc: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead.
pugna_decrepify.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.

pugna_nether_ward.desc: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.
pugna_nether_ward.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.

pugna_life_drain.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
pugna_life_drain.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.

pugna_oblivion_savant.desc: Pugna can cast spells and use items while channeling.

templar_assassin_refraction.desc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, gaining a small barrier and bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances. If a barrier is consumed, a new one is created as long as there are charges left. If an instance of damage would deal more damage than the remaining barrier, all of the damage is absorbed.
templar_assassin_refraction.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.

templar_assassin_meld.desc: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya's attack will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 6 seconds.
templar_assassin_meld.lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

templar_assassin_psi_blades.desc: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the split damage is reduced by a percentage.
templar_assassin_psi_blades.lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

templar_assassin_psionic_trap.desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they deal a small amount of damage and exert a slowing influence of 20% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 50% after 3.5 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.

templar_assassin_third_eye.desc: Templar Assassin and her teammates can see Roshan's respawn timer.

templar_assassin_hidden_gates.desc: Templar Assassin gains access to linked portals at the edges of the map usable only by her.

templar_assassin_trap.desc:
Springs the trap nearest to Templar Assassin, slowing nearby enemies. 

If the ability is in alt-cast state, springs the trap that is closest to the mouse cursor.

templar_assassin_trap_teleport.desc: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 2 seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing 375 bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
templar_assassin_trap_teleport.lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.

templar_assassin_self_trap.desc: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.

viper_poison_attack.desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 6 times.
viper_poison_attack.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.

viper_nethertoxin.desc: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Units in it have their attack speed slowed.
viper_nethertoxin.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

viper_corrosive_skin.desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1200 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
viper_corrosive_skin.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.

viper_viper_strike.desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also disabling their passives and dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
viper_viper_strike.lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.

viper_nose_dive.desc: Viper slams into the ground, releasing a Nethertoxin and splattering each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
viper_nose_dive.lore: It was thought that Netherdrake wings touch ground only in death, but some surmise that those who've witnessed more intentional landings merely haven't survived to tell the tale.

luna_lucent_beam.desc: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
luna_lucent_beam.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.

luna_lunar_orbit.desc: Creates 4 glaives that rotate 250 radius around Luna. Any enemy unit that collides with a glaive will take a percentage of Luna's Attack Damage.
luna_lunar_orbit.lore: None may approach Selemene's chosen without favor from the goddess herself.

luna_moon_glaive.desc: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
luna_moon_glaive.lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.

luna_lunar_blessing.desc: Grants 1 attack damage per level to Luna and nearby allied heroes, with Luna receiving double the attack damage bonuses. At night, Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with 250 bonus night vision + 25 per level.
luna_lunar_blessing.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

luna_eclipse.desc: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.
